title: LinkedIn Social Network Is Leaving China, but Microsoft Remains
sub_head: Software giant will have to navigate rising restrictions in China as it looks for growth for Bing, Teams and cloud
body:
Microsoft Corp. is shutting down LinkedIn in China following increased regulatory scrutiny, but the software giant has other businesses still exposed in the important market.
While other tech giants—like Google and Facebook Inc. —have mostly stayed out of China, Microsoft’s search engine Bing and its cloud-based business software remain. In addition, its Windows operating system still dominates in China.
